item.title: S.1842 - Protecting Personal Health Data Act
item.description: Authors: Klobuchar, Amy and Murkowski, Lisa Published: June 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/senate-bill/1842/text Tags: 2010s Bill Encryption Standards Healthcare Policy Protecting Personal Health Data Act US Congress Abstract: To protect the personal health data of all Americans.
